page.title: 02County Primary School
page.content: Hellifield School is designated 'County Primary' and is a co-educational school catering for children in the 4+ to 10+ age range. The fifty-nine children on roll are arranged in three classes according to age. Pre-school children enjoy a Play Group which meets in the Village Institute two mornings a week. The school's resources include a large playground and a field developed into a study area. The latter contains a pond, gardens for the pupils to cultivate, a greenhouse, a 'wild area' and a number of trees. A Parent-Teachers Association arranges educational, social and fund raising events. Evening use of the building includes a Youth Club, Scouts and Guides, Women's Institute and educational classes.
